item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 15 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 15 Now AvailablenewsNovember 11, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on October 15, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Altera Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Altera Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 11, 2025Alterais now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Altera products only.

item.title: Tanium Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Tanium Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 11, 2025Tanium Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities found in Tanium products and vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Tanium that are not in another CNA’s scope.

item.title: 2N Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: 2N Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 11, 20252N Telekomunikace a.s.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all products of 2N Telekomunikace a.s. including end-of-life/end-of-service products.

item.title: NetScaler Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: NetScaler Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 11, 2025NetScaleris now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for NetScaler issues only.

item.title: Searching by Date and Exact Phrases Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG Website
item.description: Searching by Date and Exact Phrases Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG WebsitenewsNovember 12, 2025“CVE List Keyword Search” on the CVE.ORG has been updated based upon feedback back from users. As a reminder, this search is for the CVE List only. It will only searchCVE Records. To search the overall website, use the “Site Search” located to the right of the CVE List search box above.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 29 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 29 Now AvailablenewsNovember 18, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on October 29, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Videos fromCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025Now Available
item.description: Videos fromCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025Now AvailableblogBy CVE Program|November 18, 2025Videos from all 12 sessions of the virtualCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025, held October 22-23, 2025, are now available on theCVE Program Channel on YouTube. Meeting notes are availablehere. CVE Program workshops are a way for theCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)community to regularly collaborate on specific topics in a focused manner. Discussions are always informative, and many sessions result in creative recommendations from community members that directly impact and enhance the program.

item.title: Call for Papers forVulnCon 2026Open Until December 22, 2025
item.description: Call for Papers forVulnCon 2026Open Until December 22, 2025blogBy CVE Program|November 18, 2025TheCVE ProgramandFIRSTwill co-hostVulnCon 2026at the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Paradise Valley – Scottsdale, in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA, on April 13-16, 2026. TheCall for Papersdeadlineis December 22, 2025. See detailshere.

item.title: CVE Program Expands Partnership with European Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)—ENISA Is Now a Root in the CVE Program
item.description: CVE Program Expands Partnership with European Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)—ENISA Is Now a Root in the CVE ProgramblogBy CVE Program|November 20, 2025TheCVE Programis expanding its partnership with theEuropean Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)for managing the assignment ofCVE Identifiers (CVE IDs)and publication ofCVE Recordsfor the CVE Program. ENISA is now designated as aRootfor EU member states/EU authorities, EU CSIRTs network members, and cooperative partners under ENISA’s mandate as well as otherCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)who choose ENISA as their Root.
